Class JwtUtil

java.lang.Object
uk.aiapplied.scotaccountclient.JwtUtil
@Component public class JwtUtil extends Object
Utility class for handling JWT operations in the ScotAccount client application. This class provides functionality for:
  • Loading and managing RSA keys for JWT signing and validation
  • Generating client assertion JWTs for OAuth2 authentication
  • Validating JWTs using public keys from ScotAccount's JWKS endpoint
  • Caching public keys to improve performance
Key features:
  • Automatic JWKS key rotation handling
  • Public key caching to reduce JWKS endpoint calls
  • Support for RSA-256 signing algorithm
  • Proper key format handling (PKCS#8 for private, X.509 for public)
Usage example: 
 JwtUtil jwtUtil = new JwtUtil();
 String clientAssertion = jwtUtil.createClientAssertion(
         "client-id",
         "https://token-endpoint");

    • base64UrlToBigInteger

      private BigInteger base64UrlToBigInteger(String base64Url)
      Decodes a Base64URL-encoded string to a BigInteger. Used for converting JWK components (n, e) to their BigInteger representations.
      Parameters:
      base64Url - The Base64URL-encoded string to decode
      Returns:
      The decoded value as a BigInteger
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input is not valid Base64URL

    • loadPublicKeyFromJwks

      Throws:
      Exception

    • loadPrivateKey

      public PrivateKey loadPrivateKey() throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Loads the RSA private key from the configured path.
      Returns:
      The loaded PrivateKey instance
      Throws:
      IOException - if the key file cannot be read
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the RSA algorithm is not available
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key format is invalid

    • createJwt

      public String createJwt(io.jsonwebtoken.Claims claims, long expirationMs) throws Exception
      Creates a JWT with the specified claims and expiration time.
      Parameters:
      claims - The claims to include in the JWT
      expirationMs - The expiration time in milliseconds
      Returns:
      The generated JWT string
      Throws:
      Exception - if token creation fails

    • createClientAssertion

      public String createClientAssertion(String clientId, String tokenEndpoint) throws Exception
      Creates a client assertion JWT for OAuth2 authentication.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The OAuth2 client ID
      tokenEndpoint - The OAuth2 token endpoint URL
      Returns:
      The generated client assertion JWT
      Throws:
      Exception - if token creation fails
